tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
So fine,  I never find such orthopedic  doctor in around Hyderabad.  So many senior doctors I consulted  with  these two issues.  One to one skip their  laibility to treat, Neurologist refer  to meet to orthopedic and orthopedic refer to Neuro but not get any results out of this. 

Very serious pain recently visited M/S. Swapana Hospital  in Chitanyapuri  Mr.M .kousik Reddy  garu *** ***** ********* ******** *** advised to strengthen  the back with back stepping exercise. Unbelievable only one single tablet  two times a day  for two weeks  given super relief. And physically strengthen  my work to day a almost 50% additional  gain. 
Thank you  Mr. M. Kousik Reddy Doctor garu. 
Regards. 
G Venkatramreddy 
Advocate

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: * *** *** **** ******* ***** ** *** **** ********** ****** ******. I have approached him with a bone spur on upper side of my left feet. I was feeling numbness in the feet since sometime and suspected that bone spur was the reason for that. Doctor checked the outgrown part and assured that nothing to worry. Prescribed a tablet for numbness. Everything including X-Ray completed within 30 minutes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
